    • Constructor Detail

      • GreedyAgentX

        public GreedyAgentX()
        Default Constructor, sets up the greedy agent by initializing all classfields. Name is set to "GR33D by abraram" by default.

      • GreedyAgentX

        public GreedyAgentX(java.lang.String providedName)
        Constructor, sets up the greedy agent by initializing all classfields. Name is set to String argument provided.
        Parameters:
        providedName - specify the agent's name. Set to defaults if empty string.

    • Method Detail

      • setGreedyAgent

        public void setGreedyAgent()
        Initialize all the classfields of Greedy Agent. To be called by Constructor.

      • compare

        public int compare(Card c1,
                   Card c2)
        Compare 2 cards, c1 and c2 return the difference between the comparison values of c1 and c2.
        Parameters:
        c1 - the first Card object.
        c2 - the second Card object.
        Returns:
        the difference between evaluated score of card 1 (c1) and/ (minus) card 2, c2.

      • setup

        public void setup(java.lang.String agentLeft,
                  java.lang.String agentRight)
        Tells the agent the names of the competing agents, and their relative position.

      • seeHand

        public void seeHand(java.util.List<Card> hand,
                    int order)
        Starts the round with a deal of the cards. The agent is told the cards they have (16 cards, or 20 if they are the leader) and the order they are playing (0 for the leader, 1 for the left of the leader, and 2 for the right of the leader).

      • discard

        public Card[] discard()
        This method will be called on the leader agent, after the deal. If the agent is not the leader, it is sufficient to return an empty array. Works by removing the lowest ranked 4 cards hand according to the Comparator class Object cardComparator declared above.
        Returns:
        discardArr an array of cards that are to be discarded.

      • noCardOfLeadersSuitFallback

        public Card noCardOfLeadersSuitFallback()
        This method keeps track the best possible move to play in case Agent does not have the card belonging to the leader's suit. Heuristics involve If possible try to play a trump card and win else play the lowest value card in hand.
        Returns:
        outCard, the best possible legal card to get rid of in case Agent does not have leader's played suit.

      • playCard

        public Card playCard()
        Agent returns the card they wish to play. A 200 ms timelimit is given for this method. This method implements the above mentioned heuristic to make the best possible choice locally.
        Returns:
        the Card they wish to play.

      • seeCard

        public void seeCard(Card card,
                    java.lang.String agent)
        Sees an Agent play a card. A 50 ms timelimit is given to this function.
        Parameters:
        card, - the Card played.
        agent, - the name of the agent who played the card.

      • seeResult

        public void seeResult(java.lang.String winner)
        See the result of the trick. A 50 ms timelimit is given to this method. This method will be called on each eagent at the end of each trick.
        Parameters:
        winner, - the player who played the winning card.

      • seeScore

        public void seeScore(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> scoreboard)
        See the score for each player. A 50 ms timelimit is givien to this method
        Parameters:
        scoreboard, - a Map from agent names to their score.

      • sayName

        public java.lang.String sayName()
        Returns the Agents name. A 10ms timelimit is given here. This method will only be called once.
        Returns:
        the name of the agent.
